source.name: Colorado Plateau Rapid Ecoregion Assessment Indicators: Natural Vegetation Fragmentation
source.description: This dataset presents measures of landscape fragmentation calculated by FRAGSTATS at 4KM and HUC5 reporting unit levels.  Fragmentation integrates the influence of urban, agriculture, invasive vegetation, roads, pipelines, utility lines, oil/gas wells, and water on patches of natural vegetation.
